question:
Recently, the Union Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions launched the electronic-Human Resource Management System (e-HRMS) on the occasion of Good Governance Day. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Good Governance Day observed to mark the birth anniversary of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel
  2. The e-HRMS portal is available for central as well as state government employees
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Good Governance Day is observed to mark the birth anniversary of former Prime Minister Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee (25<sup>th</sup> December). <u>Second statement is incorrect.</u> The portal is currently available for central government employees but very soon other departments and state governments will also follow this system.
